title: Safe Freight Program – Tanker Trailer Inspection

sections.title: Identification & Placarding
items: Emergency info panels are clean, visible, and legible on both sides and rear
Emergency panels show contact details and are accessible from ground level
Dangerous goods signage (if required) is appropriate and in good condition
Tank compliance plate is present and includes manufacturer, approval #, serial no.
Tank is within hydrostatic test period (5 years)
Hatch/vent tests are within 2.5-year window

sections.title: Barrel Condition
items: Barrel shows no major dents, cracks, or weld failures
All drain pipes and fittings are in serviceable condition
No visible signs of liquid leaks or weeping from tank or fittings
Coaming and rollover protection present and intact
Earth reel (if fitted) is secure and continuity tested

sections.title: Electrical Systems
items: Electrical wiring and conduits are intact and secure
All lights are operational and correctly rated (LED, IP67 for critical zones)
Electrical connectors are latched and IP54+ rated
Junction boxes and enclosures are IP67 or better

sections.title: Valves, Fittings & Delivery
items: No leaks from valves, vents or seals
API valves and adapters function correctly and close securely
Emergency stop system shuts off internal valves as expected
All valve caps are tethered and free from damage
Dip/fill tubes are secured and hatches lock properly
Pressure/vacuum vents in place and clean

sections.title: Braking & Drive-Away Protection
items: Brakes engage with park brake applied (immobilisation check)
Brakes release with park brake disengaged
Safety gate (if fitted) functions correctly and interlocks as intended
Overfill system (if fitted) responds correctly during test

sections.title: Hoses, Stowage & Fire Safety
items: Vapour & transfer hoses are tested, tagged, and in good condition
Hose stowage is secure and poppets sealed
Fire extinguishers in-date, accessible, and quick-release mounted
Safety equipment is clearly marked and not obstructing discharge zone

sections.title: Final Sign-Off
items: Vehicle passed all required inspection points OR items marked for follow-up
